Text: michaelrwatson, you clearly are new to this..an r5 is a russian dvd 5 of said movie..then someone muxes english audio to the print. most times r5's have bootleg audio until a line audio becomes available, in which case when the line audio is muxed to the print, it will then say "R5 Line"..I hope you learned something today, everyone has to start somewhere.
